namespace c784_D
{
    class MainClass
    {
        public static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            var tstsr = Console.ReadLine().Trim();
            var m = Int32.Parse(tstsr);

            for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
            {
                var n = Int32.Parse(Console.ReadLine().Trim());
                var s = Console.ReadLine().Trim();

                var isbad = 0;

                var pieces = s.Split('W');

                foreach (var p in pieces)
                {
                    if (p.Length == 0)
                    {
                        continue;
                    }

                    var hasR = p.IndexOf('R') != -1;
                    var hasB = p.IndexOf('B') != -1;

                    if (p.Length < 2 || !hasR || !hasB)
                    {
                        isbad = 1;
                        break;
                    }

                    for (int j = 1; j < p.Length; j++)
                    {
                        if (p[j] == p[j - 1])
                        {
                            isbad = 1;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }

                if (isbad == 0)
                {
                    Console.WriteLine("YES");
                }
                else
                {
                    Console.WriteLine("NO");
                }
            }
        }
